message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you at a special price of $12,000. This is a great deal considering its value to me. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I appreciate your offer, $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000,  which still allows me to make a reasonable profit. Let me know if you're interested in this price.
I understand your position, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
